title: Sri Lanka Housing Approvals
description: Building Permits in Sri Lanka increased to 3052 in the fourth quarter of 2021 from 1992 in the third quarter of 2021. Building Permits in Sri Lanka averaged 2820.13  from 1996 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 4505  in the second quarter of 2006 and a record low of 1021  in the second quarter of 2020. This page provides - Sri Lanka Housing Approvals- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Bank Of Sri Lanka
